statements: UPDATE customer_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE account_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
UPDATE customer_accounts SET account_email = 'newemail@example.com', account_name = 'New Account Name' WHERE account_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765'
UPDATE customer_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE account_id = '1a6d9612-97cb-4b7d-b7d8-2fbbc4dae9ed';
UPDATE customer_accounts SET account_email = 'newemail@example.com', account_balance = 5000.00 WHERE account_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE account_permissions SET permission_name = 'Admin' WHERE permission_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', email_address='johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE account_permissions SET permission_name='Admin' WHERE permission_id=2;
UPDATE customer_accounts SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=123
UPDATE account_permissions SET permission_level='Admin' WHERE permission_id=456
UPDATE customer_accounts SET email = 'test@example.com', first_name = 'John' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE account_permissions SET permission_level = 'admin' WHERE permission_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 5000.00 WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET last_name = 'Johnson', email = 'johnson@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 1000.00 WHERE account_id = 101
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 1000 WHERE account_name = 'Savings'
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 1000 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 500, description = 'Deposit' WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
